懀字的基本解释

懀
wèi
憎恶。
蹩闷。
形容眉目的相貌。

懀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wèi］
［《廣韻》烏外切，去泰，影。］
［《廣韻》烏快切，去夬，影。］
(1)嫌恶；憎恶。
(2)用同“快”。

懀字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懀； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页405第09
【廣韻】【集韻】烏外切【正韻】烏會切，?音薈。【集韻】懀懶，嫌惡也。　又悶也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?烏快切，音䵳。【類篇】心惡也。　又【五音集韻】烏括切，音斡。憎也。

懀字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
懀字的起名意思

暂无。

Stupefied
Basic explanation of words
Stupefied
wèi
Hate.
Lame.
Describe the appearance of the eyebrows.
Stupefied
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wèi］
["Guangyun" Wu outside cut, go to Thailand, film. ]
["Guangyun" Wu quickly cut, go to 夬, shadow. ]
(1) Disgust; hate.
(2) Use the same "fast".
Stupefied
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　懀; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 405 09
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Wu Wai cut [Zheng Yun] Wu will cut,? Yin Hui. [Jiyun] Lazy and disgusting.　It's bored again.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun] again? Wu quick cut, sound hai. [Classes] Disgusting too.　[Five-tone collection rhyme] Wukuoqie, sound moor. Hate too.
Stupefied
